title: Ultrafiltration Behavior of CuO Particles Synthesized without and with Different Surfactants using PAN and PES Membranes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00462K, Paper
Olabimpe Genevieve Badru, Ä°me Akanyeti
Four different CuO particles were synthesized, with no surfactant(CuO/NS) and with three surfactants: Triton X-100(CuO/TX100), Cetyltrimethylammonium bromide(CuO/CTAB) and Sodium dodecyl sulfate(CuO/SDS). The filtration behavior of these particles at different concentrations...
